interface.name: rssFields
interface.label: RSS fields
interface.help: Other RSS fields. All values are in text format.

messages.content: Summarize this article {{2.url}} in a way that makes it easy to create social media posts from the output. Be sure to include the URLs for the actual tools mentioned only when relevant and not the article you are summarizing.

Act as a professional video script editor. Review and verify that the script you just produced is written in a way that ensures the created video should be at least 30 seconds but not more than 59 seconds.

select.label: Create a Chat Completion (GPT and o1 models)
